mch_guide.title: How to get WeChat Pay Merchant number
mch_guide.step_2: 2、WeChat Pay Merchant ID can be viewed in the【Account Center - Merchant Information】of WeChat Pay Merchant Platform.
mch_guide.step_3: Note:If you are not a WeChat Pay merchant yet, you can click 'Become a Merchant' on the login homepage, register and apply for a WeChat Pay merchant number, fill in relevant enterprise information as prompted, such as business license, corporate account, etc., and submit for review. After passing the review, you can obtain a WeChat Pay merchant number .

app_guide.title: How to get APPID
app_guide.step_1: 1、In the WeChat Pay Merchant Platform, go to [Product Center - AppID Account Management] and click "Associate APPID". Fill in the APPID of the previously obtained WeChat Official Account or Mini Program and confirm the association. Log in to the WeChat Open Platform and agree to the association in the Message Center.
app_guide.step_2:
2、Copy the associated APPID and fill it into the form. 

 note: If no Official Account has been associated yet, you need to associate an Official Account first. Operation method: Click to associate AppID
app_guide.step_3: Then log in to the WeChat Official Platform ({url}), enter the Official Account backend, and obtain the Developer ID (AppID) in [Settings and Development - Basic Configuration]. If it's a Mini Program, you can obtain the Mini Program APPID in the Mini Program management backend of the WeChat Official Platform.

api_guide.title: How to get APIv3 Key
api_guide.step_1: 1、Login to WeChat Pay Merchant Platform, enter【Account Center - Account Settings - API Security】, click【APIv3 Key】
api_guide.step_2: 2、In the pop-up window, click “I have communicated”, input a 32-bit random key (containing numbers and uppercase and lowercase letters), click Get SMS Verification Code, input the verification code and click “Confirm”, then set successfully.

cert_guide.title: How to Obtain Payment Certificate Files and Keys
cert_guide.step_1: 1、Log in to the WeChat Pay Merchant Platform, go to [Account Center - API Security], and apply for a new certificate. Follow the guide [Download Certificate Tool], copy the obtained request string to the text box, and click Next.
cert_guide.step_2: 2、After applying, download apiclient_cert.pem (certificate file) and apiclient_key.pem (private key file).

serial_guide.title: How to get Certificate Serial Number
serial_guide.step_1: 1、View the certificate serial number in [Account Center - API Security] of the WeChat Pay Merchant Platform.

app_guide.title: How to get APPID
app_guide.step_1: 1、Copy the number below the application name, which is the APPID

coze_cn.tip:
Go to Coze API - Authorization - Create New Application（{url}） 
Step 1: Create an OAuth application（"Client Type" is "Web Backend Application"）
Step 2: Fill in the "Redirect URL" in: {redirect_url} 
Step 3: Fill in {client_id} and {client_secret} in the form below,check all permissions and save.
coze_cn.tip_1: Ensure you click 'Save' on the Coze side before clicking 'Confirm'

app_builder.tip:
Go to Baidu Cloud - App Builder（{url}） 
Step 1: Login and click "API Key" on the left navigation bar 
Step 2: Click "Create API Key"（select "AppBuilder" for "Service", and configure application resources as needed）
Step 3: Complete creation, copy the API Key and fill it in the form below.

53ai.tip:
Go to 53AI（{url}） 
Step 1: Login and click "Settings" on the left navigation bar 
Step 2: Click "Generate Secret Key" under "Enterprise Information" 
Step 3: After generation, copy the Sercet Key and fill it in the form below.

dify_agent_get_tip:
Go to Dify and login ({url}) 
Step 1: Select the agent to be accessed, click "Access API" 
Step 2: Copy "API Server" and "API Secret Key" in the upper right corner, and fill in the form below.
53ai_agent_get_tip:
Go to 53AI and login ({url}) 
 Step 1: Select the agent to be accessed, click "Access API" 
 Step 2: Copy "API Endpoint" 、 "Bot-Id" 和 "SECRET_KEY", and fill in the form below.
bailian_agent_get_tip:
Go to Alibaba Bailian and login ({ url })
 Step 1: Login Alibaba Bailian and go to the Application - Application Management page.
 Step 2:  Select an application, copy the 'Application ID' in the application card and paste it into the form below.
 Step3: Click Publish under the application card to obtain the API - KEY, copy and paste it into the form below.
volcengine_agent_get_tip:
Go to Volcengine ({ url })
 Step 1: Login Volcengine, click to enter My Applications ({my_url})
 Step 2: Click an existing application (or create an application), click to copy bot - xxxxxx in the upper left corner (there is a copy button behind it), and paste it into the form below
 Step 3: Click 'API Call Guide' in the upper right corner, click to select API Key and copy, then copy a key and paste it into the form below.
yuanqi_agent_get_tip:
Go to Tencent Yuanqi({ url })
 Step 1: Login Tencent Yuanqi, go to my creation. 
 Step 2: Click the More Button in the lower right corner of the agent card, click Call API (new agent needs to wait for approval to have). 
 Step 3: Click copy  agent ID, paste it below. 
 Step 4: Click copy Token, and paste it below.
auth_required: {provider_name} is not authorized, please go to {provider_name} to authorize
local_config_limited_desc: Due to the current system access being an intranet address ({url}), adding/configuring Coze agents, WeChat Pay, and Alipay is not possible. It needs to be deployed to an address accessible from the external network before configuration.
